reviewText: This 4 pack is tremendous because it has two of the best earlier movies by Chuck Norris. I may or may not ever care to try and sit through the other two. The only way to make this better is to remove the other two features, and replace them with LONE WOLF MCQUADE and any other Chuck Norris movie.
summary: Who Cares About the other Two
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)

reviewText: These movies were filled with too much bad language and violence for my taste. BUT, I still like Chuck Norris.
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)

reviewText: This is What I expected. I mainly got this 4 pack for the 2 Norris movies. It would have been more expensive to buy separately.
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)

reviewText: If you are a fan of Chuck Norris you're in for a real treat with this Movie Collection!!  I highly recommend this Collection!!
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)

reviewText: It arrived on time and in perfect condition. I could'nt be happier with it. I love Chuck Norris movies.  They're a lot of fun.
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)

reviewText: This four movie pack I liked. The only thing is it does not have any movie features. Basically, you just play the movie in English. There are no audio options and I like to play my movies with subtitles.The Octagon and the Force of One are great movies. I personally think a Force of One is the best of the two Chuck Norris movies. The other 2 movies I didn't even watch. I bought this pack just to get the Chuck Norris movies, which are hard to get or rent these days. The picture is fine and clear and so is the sound.
Title: Action 4 Pack: Volume 2 (The Octogon / A Force of One / Exit Speed / Garrison)
